author: Matt Young
title: Coronavirus Australia: Supermarkets, pharmacies given the option to stay ‘open 24/7’
description: Coronavirus Australia: Supermarkets, pharmacies given the option to stay ‘open 24/7’ news.com.au
content: Supermarkets and pharmacies across NSW have been given permission to trade 24 hours a day, seven days a week.NSW Planning and Public Spaces Minister Rob Stokes made the announcement on Twitter on Wednesday evening, posting that if a business chooses, it will … [+2613 chars]
